sentences.en: Although this recipe looks long, it is actually very quick to prepare.
sentences.cn: 尽管这个菜谱看上去很长，其实做起来很快。

sentences.en: Different writers will prepare to varying degrees.
sentences.cn: 不同作者的准备程度也会各不相同。

sentences.en: He watched the barman prepare the beer he had ordered.
sentences.cn: 他看着酒吧招待员备好他点的啤酒。

sentences.en: His doctor had told him to prepare himself for surgery.
sentences.cn: 他的医生已经告诉他做好动手术的准备。

sentences.en: Nothing can prepare you for the shock and grief of widowhood.
sentences.cn: 守寡的打击和悲伤让人难以承受。

sentences.en: On average each report requires 1,000 hours to prepare.
sentences.cn: 准备一份报告平均需要1,000小时。

sentences.en: Prepare the garnishes shortly before you are ready to serve the soup.
sentences.cn: 在快要准备上汤前再在上面加点装饰菜。

sentences.en: Prepare the souffle dish before making up the souffle mixture.
sentences.cn: 在搅拌做蛋奶酥的各种原料之前先要把盘子准备好。

sentences.en: Some ready made meals are nutritious and very easy to prepare.
sentences.cn: 一些预制膳食很有营养，而且烹调起来很简单。

sentences.en: The ground staff do all they can to prepare the pitch.
sentences.cn: 运动场管理员全力整备球场。

sentences.en: The older child should be able to prepare a simple meal.
sentences.cn: 那个年纪稍大的孩子应当会做一顿简单的饭菜。

sentences.en: The players are in defiant mood as they prepare for tomorrow'sgame.
sentences.cn: 球员在备战明天的比赛时带着蔑视对手的情绪。

sentences.en: The prosecution wanted more time to prepare their case.
sentences.cn: 原告想要有更多的时间来准备诉讼。

sentences.en: The sauce takes 25 minutes to prepare and cook.
sentences.cn: 这个调味料从准备到做好要25分钟。

sentences.en: This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare.
sentences.cn: 这种稍加变化的可口煎蛋卷做起来又快又容易。

trans.tran_cn: 把…准备好，为…做准备，预备饭菜，调制
trans.tran_en: to make plans or arrangements for something that will happen in the future
to make plans or arrangements for something that will happen in the future
